name: EF: Freedom
description:
You have been sent to a planet to find a criminal named Apep. Unfortunately, you don't have many supplies and must create your own weapons and skills. Gather resources and bring him to justice.

EF:Freedom is an experiment to create a crafting game on top of an RPG engine, specifically the one used for Endless Reality.

System Requirements

Windows

  • Windows 7 SP1 or later
  • Visual C++ 2017 Redistributable for 32bit.
    • Download vc_redist.x86.exe from here.
  • OpenGL 3.3 or later

Mac OSX

  • Mac OSX 10.7 or later
  • OpenGL 3.3 or later

Linux

  • Any modern distro (glibc 2.17, libstdc++6 4.8))
  • 64bit (x86_64) install
  • OpenGL 3.3 or later
Links
  • Official Website
  • Soundtrack on BandCamp
Troubleshooting

- Windows "Cannot find DLL: "

Make sure you installed the 32bit Visual C++ 2017 Redistributable for 32bit listed above under System Requirements. It can also be found within the Redist folder.

Any bugs and questions can be sent to support@hackerguild.com or message me on twitter @thothonegan.
